props.name: href
props.description: The URL that the item navigates to. `href` is passed to the underlying `<a>` element. If `as` is specified, the component may need different props. If the item contains a sub-nav, the item is rendered as a `<button>` and `href` is ignored.

props.name: aria-current
props.description: Set `aria-current` to `"page"` to indicate that the item represents the current page. Set `aria-current` to `"location"` to indicate that the item represents the current location on a page. For more information about `aria-current`, see [MDN](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/Accessibility/ARIA/Attributes/aria-current).

props.name: defaultOpen
props.description: The open state of the item when it is initially rendered if the item has a SubNav.

props.name: inactiveText
props.description: Text to explain why this item is currently inactive and cannot be activated.

props.name: variant
props.description: `inline` descriptions are positioned beside primary text. `block` descriptions are positioned below primary text.

props.name: truncate
props.description: Whether the inline description should truncate the text on overflow.

props.name: className
props.description: Custom CSS class name.

props.name: style
props.description: Custom CSS styles.

props.name: children
props.description: A related set of NavList.Items

props.name: title
props.description:
The text that gets rendered as the group's heading. Alternatively, you can pass the `NavList.GroupHeading` component as a child of `NavList.Group`.
If both `title` and `NavList.GroupHeading` are passed, `NavList.GroupHeading` will be rendered as the heading.

props.name: auxiliaryText
props.description: Secondary text which provides additional information about a `Group`.

props.name: variant
props.description:
Style variations. Usage is discretionary.

- `"filled"` - Superimposed on a background, offset from nearby content
- `"subtle"` - Relatively less offset from nearby content

props.name: as
props.description: HTML element to render as.

props.name: label
props.description: Accessible name for the control.

props.name: icon
props.description: Octicon to pass into IconButton. When this is not set, TrailingAction renders as a `Button` instead of an `IconButton`.

props.name: href
props.description: href when the TrailingAction is rendered as a link.

props.name: label
props.description: Accessible name for the control.

props.name: pages
props.description: The total number of pages, used to calculate the number of items to show at a given time.

props.name: items
props.description: The NavList.Items to render in the group.

props.name: renderItem
props.description: A function that returns a ReactNode to render in the group. If this is not provided, the group will only render the items in the array.
